question: Taro Chatung, who passed away recently, was the veteran journalist of which state?
explanation: Taro Chatung (57), the veteran journalist of Arunachal Pradesh, has passed away in Itanagar on 26th October 2019. He was one of the first persons in the state to direct and produce a full-length feature film in Hindi as it is spoken in the state. With his \"News & Views\" programme breaking all records of viewership, Chatung is often referred to as the \"Father of the electronic media\" in the state.
